markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103).
name: Divine
